tool.name: Generate scatter plots
tool.description: for any given markers in FCS file.

exit_code.description: Please provide a comma separated list of channels to plot
Please provide numeric values for the list of channels to plot

tool.help:
This tool allows automated gating of debris using flowDensity and conversion of FCS files to text using the FCSTrans transformation.
-----
**Input files**
This tool takes valid FCS files as input.
**Output files**
This tool generates a scatter plot for each marker combination in a single pdf.
